flawed_nl_solution:
Micah can type 20 x 60 = <<20*60=1200>>1200 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 40 x 60 = <<40*60=4200>>4200 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 4200 - 1200 = <<4200-1200=3000>>3000 words more than Micah in an hour.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 4200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
